summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3433, for the improvement of East 47th Street, from Latona Avenue to 7th Avenue Northeast, all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 42608 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
